DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate novel sheathe speculum provide improved visualization cervix compare standard ( `` non sheathe '' ) speculum , estimate sheathe speculum cause less discomfort examination .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Sheathed Standard Speculum Visualization Cervix
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized trial physician investigator perform clinically indicate vaginal speculum examination use either sheathe standard plastic speculum , determine speculum provide best visualization cervix . As secondary outcome , study participant record pain level 10-cm visual analogue scale .
DOC.criteria: Undergoing clinically indicate vaginal speculum examination . Subject least 1 prior vaginal deliver > 20 week gestational age . Able read speak English . Active vulvar lesion condition ( sexually transmit infection , vestibulodynia , candida , vaginitis , vulvar dermatologic condition ) . Menopausal use hormone replacement therapy . Genital atrophy . Chronic pelvic pain , dyspareunia , interstitial cystitis .
